replies.msg:
Operating System: Windows 10 Home (64-bit Edition) (Recovery Disk)

Case: CYBERPOWERPC Zeus Mini II mITX Gaming Chassis w/ USB 3.0 [4.4in(W) x 13in(H) x 17.4in(D)] (Black Colour)

CPU: INTEL® Core™ i5-7400 Quad Core 3.00 GHz 6MB Cache LGA1151 + HD Graphics

Freebies: FREE Q1 2017 Intel Enthusiast Gaming Bundle

Overclocking Service: No Overclocking

Cooling Fan: INTEL Standard CPU Cooler

Motherboard: MSI B250I PRO ITX w/ USB 3.1, 1 PCIe x16, 4 SATA3, 1 M.2

Memory: 8GB (1x8GB) DDR4/2400mhz Dual Channel Memory (HyperX Fury w/Heat Spreader)

Video Card: MSI GeForce® GTX 1050 Ti 4GB Video Card (Single Card)

Power Supply Upgrade: 400 Watts Power Supplies (Cooler Master MasterWatt Lite 400watt Gaming Power Supply)

Hard Drive: 1TB Seagate SATA-III 6.0Gb/s 7200RPM Hard Drive (Single Hard Drive)

Sound: Built-in 3D Premium Surround Sound

Network: Built-in 10/100/1000 Mbps Network Card

USB Port and Hub: Built-in 2x USB2.0 Ports + 2x USB3.0 Ports

隻箱無得買 I5搭1050ti 4000左右 加埋windows就5000
